name: Export Dext clients to Airtable
description:
Use this template to automatically export your Dext clients to Airtable.

The template expects your Airtable table to have the following columns:
1) Client ID
2) Name
3) Practice code
4) Provider ID
5) Health score
6) Alert level

The template is scheduled to run every day at 10:00 AM. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
